dict.acceptation: 奶牛，乳牛；母兽；雌（象，鲸等）；<侮辱>对女性的蔑称；

sent.orig: The gate is lifted, the cow is released and the next cow enters.
sent.trans: 门升起，奶牛被放出来，另一头奶牛进去。

sent.orig: A Braunvieh cow wearing a cow bell below Fuorcla Sesvenna in the Engadin, Switzerland.
sent.trans: 一只戴着铃铛的布劳恩母牛在瑞士恩加丁的高原上。

sent.orig: As the The gate is lifted, the cow is released the next cow enters.
sent.trans: 当门抬起，这头奶牛被释放，下一头奶牛进来。

sent.orig: Be the one between Cow A and Cow C.
sent.trans: 做一个徘徊在牛A和牛C之间的牛。

sent.orig: Better a good cow than a cow of a good kind.
